headline.main: In Private, Court Nominee Gorsuch Lauds Failed Obama Pick
headline.print_headline: In Private, Court Nominee Gorsuch Lauds Failed Obama Pick

docs.lead_paragraph: A top Senate Democrat says Supreme Court nominee Neil Gorsuch has said he hopes to be "half the nominee" as the judge nominated by President Barack Obama last year, only to be blocked by Senate Republicans.

headline.main: Putin: Obama Administration Trying to Undermine Trump
headline.print_headline: Putin: Obama Administration Trying to Undermine Trump

headline.main: Alleged 9/11 Plotter Blasts Obama in Letter From Guantanamo

headline.main: Plan to Reduce Medicare Drug Costs Is Withdrawn After Bipartisan Criticism
